title: Key Account Executive Job at Bogo Beverage Limited

Post a Job (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); CLICK HERE TO JOIN OUR WHATSAPP CHANNEL Any Specialization Accounting / Audit / Finance Administration/ Office/ Operations Advertising/ Social Media/ Marketing/ PR Agriculture / Agro Allied Analyst/ Quality Control Automotive/ Car Services Aviation / Airline Banking / Insurance Building Design / Architecture Construction / Mining Consulting / Business Strategy/ Planning Craftsmen / Artisans Creatives (Arts, Design, Fashion) Customer Service Domestic / Janitorial Services Driving / Haulage Education / Teaching / Training Engineering / Technical Executive / Management Freelance / Data Entry Government Agencies / Public Sector Graduates / Freshers Grants / Scholarships Hospitality / Food Services HSE / Safety Management Human Resources / Recruitment Information Technology / ICT Internship/ Industrial Training Legal / Law Logistics / Transportation/ Supply Manufacturing / Production Maritime Services / Shipping Media / Art / Entertainment Medical/ Healthcare / Pharmaceutical Military / Para-Military NGO / Community Services Oil & Gas / Energy Procurement/ Purchasing Project Management Real Estate / Property / Surveying Research / Survey Risk Management / Compliance Sales / Business Development Secretarial / PA Security / Intelligence Software/ Programming / Web development Sports / Fitness Supply Chain/ Store Technicians Telecommunications Tourism / Travels Vocational Trade and Services Any Work Level Entry Level (Trainee) Executive (Director, Head of Dept) Experienced (Non-Manager) Internship Manager (Staff Supervisor) Senior Executive (MD, CEO, COO) Vocational (Skilled/Unskilled Labour) Search { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "title": "Key Account Executive", "description": "Bogo Beverage Limited is a young and dynamic total manufacturing, distribution and marketing of quality beverage company, with a strong entrepreneurial spirit and growth mindset. We are determined to dominate the beverage sector with our quality brands, apt commercial acumen and cognate experience of the Nigerian consumers and Africa. We are recruiting to fill the position below: Job Position: Key Account Executive Job Location: Abuja Employment Type: Full-time Job Summary We are sourcing Key Account Executives across Abuja for a beverage company  The Key Account Executive will be responsible for managing and growing strategic relationships with key accounts in the modern trade and HORECA channels. This includes ensuring effective distribution, maximising sales, visibility, and brand presence for a premium portfolio of wines ,spirits & energy drinks. The ideal candidate must have strong sales experience, excellent negotiation skills, and deep knowledge of the Nigerian beverage industry. Key Responsibilities Develop and maintain strong relationships with key accounts in modern trade and HORECA channels. Achieve monthly and annual sales targets for assigned portfolio. Ensure full product availability and visibility across assigned outlets. Execute trade marketing activities and promotional plans tailored for each key account. Distribute & collaborate with distributors and internal logistics teams to ensure timely delivery and stock availability. Monitor competitor activities and report trends, pricing, and promotional strategies. Negotiate trade terms, contracts, and promotions with key accounts. Track account performance and prepare regular sales reports and forecasts. Train outlet staff on product knowledge and brand standards. Ensure adherence to brand standards, pricing, and merchandising guidelines. Key Requirements Education: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. Experience: Minimum 3 - 5 years in FMCG/Alcoholic Beverage industry, with at least 2 years managing key accounts in Nigeria. Industry Knowledge: Solid understanding of Nigerian modern trade and HORECA landscape. Skills: Strong negotiation and relationship-building skills. Excellent presentation and communication skills. Analytical and strategic thinking. Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines. Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word). Other: Own a Vehicle Valid driver’s license. Preferred: Experience working with both local and international beverage brands. Knowledge of category management and in-store execution. Existing relationships with major retail chains and premium hospitality venues. Self Starter. Method of Application Interested and qualified candidates should send their corresponding Resume to: careers.bogo@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.", "datePosted": "2025-09-08", "validThrough": "2025-10-09", "employmentType": "Full-Time", "hiringOrganization": { "@type": "Organization", "name": "

0, "unitText": "MONTH" } } } Key Account Executive Job at Bogo Beverage Limited Bogo Beverage Limited is a young and dynamic total manufacturing, distribution and marketing of quality beverage company, with a strong entrepreneurial spirit and growth mindset. We are determined to dominate the beverage sector with our quality brands, apt commercial acumen and cognate experience of the Nigerian consumers and Africa. We are recruiting to fill the position below: Job Position: Key Account Executive Job Location: Abuja Employment Type: Full-time Job Summary We are sourcing Key Account Executives across Abuja for a beverage company  The Key Account Executive will be responsible for managing and growing strategic relationships with key accounts in the modern trade and HORECA channels. This includes ensuring effective distribution, maximising sales, visibility, and brand presence for a premium portfolio of wines ,spirits & energy drinks. The ideal candidate must have strong sales experience, excellent negotiation skills, and deep knowledge of the Nigerian beverage industry. Key Responsibilities Develop and maintain strong relationships with key accounts in modern trade and HORECA channels. Achieve monthly and annual sales targets for assigned portfolio. Ensure full product availability and visibility across assigned outlets. Execute trade marketing activities and promotional plans tailored for each key account. Distribute & collaborate with distributors and internal logistics teams to ensure timely delivery and stock availability. Monitor competitor activities and report trends, pricing, and promotional strategies. Negotiate trade terms, contracts, and promotions with key accounts. Track account performance and prepare regular sales reports and forecasts. Train outlet staff on product knowledge and brand standards. Ensure adherence to brand standards, pricing, and merchandising guidelines. Key Requirements Education: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. Experience: Minimum 3 - 5 years in FMCG/Alcoholic Beverage industry, with at least 2 years managing key accounts in Nigeria. Industry Knowledge: Solid understanding of Nigerian modern trade and HORECA landscape. Skills: Strong negotiation and relationship-building skills. Excellent presentation and communication skills. Analytical and strategic thinking. Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines. Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word). Other: Own a Vehicle Valid driver’s license. Preferred: Experience working with both local and international beverage brands. Knowledge of category management and in-store execution. Existing relationships with major retail chains and premium hospitality venues. Self Starter. Method of Application Interested and qualified candidates should send their corresponding Resume to: careers.bogo@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email. We are recruiting to fill the position below: Job Position: Administrative Manager Job Location: Asaba, Delta Employment Type: Full-time Job Brief The ideal candidate must have a strong background in security management, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with other departments Responsibilities Oversee and support the security team, assign security officers to specific patrol areas & Beat, ensure duties are performed effectively and address any issues providing training and disciplinary action where necessary Monitor team and individual performance, provide feedback, and hold regular team briefings. Manage day-to-day security operations and become familiar with the site layout or beat allocation to create and implement effective policies and procedures. Oversee day to day activities of each department in the office,Incident Management and Emergency Respond to and investigate any security breaches or incidents, escort unauthorized personnel from the site, conduct emergency drills, and assist with evacuation in an emergency, liaising with the emergency services where necessary. Requirements HND/B.Sc in any relevant field of study 2-3years of experience in a security role, with supervisory experience preferred. Strong knowledge of security protocols and emergency response procedures. Excellent leadership and team management skills. Strong communication and interpersonal skills for interaction with staff and stakeholders. Method of Application Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@leamconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail. Note: For more information, please contact 09047710414 on WhatsApp.", "datePosted": "2025-09-08", "validThrough": "2025-09-21", "employmentType": "Full-Time", "hiringOrganization": { "@type": "Organization", "name": "LEAM Consulting" }, "jobLocation": { "@type": "Place", "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "postalCode": ". We are recruiting to fill the position below: Job Position: Administrative Manager Job Location: Asaba, Delta Employment Type: Full-time Job Brief The ideal candidate must have a strong background in security management, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with other departments Responsibilities Oversee and support the security team, assign security officers to specific patrol areas & Beat, ensure duties are performed effectively and address any issues providing training and disciplinary action where necessary Monitor team and individual performance, provide feedback, and hold regular team briefings. Manage day-to-day security operations and become familiar with the site layout or beat allocation to create and implement effective policies and procedures. Oversee day to day activities of each department in the office,Incident Management and Emergency Respond to and investigate any security breaches or incidents, escort unauthorized personnel from the site, conduct emergency drills, and assist with evacuation in an emergency, liaising with the emergency services where necessary. Requirements HND/B.Sc in any relevant field of study 2-3years of experience in a security role, with supervisory experience preferred. Strong knowledge of security protocols and emergency response procedures. Excellent leadership and team management skills. Strong communication and interpersonal skills for interaction with staff and stakeholders. Method of Application Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@leamconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail. At Baker Industries, we integrate advanced IT solutions to solve Real Estate Challenges. Simplify and Decentralize process of property ownership, acquisition, documentation, and verification. We are constantly leveraging on advanced technology to innovate new ways of Real Estate Investment. We are recruiting to fill the position below: Job Position: Social Media Manager Job Location: Sabo,Yaba - Lagos Employment Type: Full-time Job Summary The Social Media Manager will be responsible for managing and growing the company’s online presence across all social media platforms. The ideal candidate is creative, data-driven, and passionate about digital storytelling. Key Responsibilities Develop and execute social media strategies to increase brand awareness, engagement, and lead generation. Manage content creation (graphics, captions, videos, reels, stories, etc.) and publishing schedules. Monitor, track, and report performance metrics to optimize campaigns. Engage with the online community, respond to inquiries, and build brand loyalty. Collaborate with the marketing and sales team to align campaigns with business goals. Stay updated with social media trends, tools, and best practices. Requirements 1 – 2 years of proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role. Strong knowledge of Instagram, Facebook, Twitter (X), LinkedIn, TikTok, and YouTube. Basic design skills (Canva/Photoshop) and knowledge of video editing is an advantage. Excellent communication and copywriting skills. Ability to analyze insights and adapt strategies accordingly. Creative, proactive, and able to work with minimal supervision. Benefits Competitive salary (?120,000 – ?150,000). Growth opportunities within the company. A dynamic and collaborative work environment. Method of Application Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@bakersindustries.io using “Application – Social Media Manager” as the subject of the mail.", "datePosted": "2025-09-08", "validThrough": "2025-10-09", "employmentType": "Full-Time", "hiringOrganization": { "@type": "Organization", "name": "Baker Industries Limited" }, "jobLocation": { "@type": "Place", "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "postalCode": ". ", "value": "187005" }, "baseSalary": { "@type": "MonetaryAmount", "currency": "NGN", "value": { "@type": "QuantitativeValue", "minValue": 75000, "maxValue": 150000, "unitText": "MONTH" } } } Social Media Manager Job at Baker Industries Limited Baker Industries is a Real Estate Company with an hybrid of Real Estate and technology. At Baker Industries, we integrate advanced IT solutions to solve Real Estate Challenges. Simplify and Decentralize process of property ownership, acquisition, documentation, and verification. We are constantly leveraging on advanced technology to innovate new ways of Real Estate Investment. We are recruiting to fill the position below: Job Position: Social Media Manager Job Location: Sabo,Yaba - Lagos Employment Type: Full-time Job Summary The Social Media Manager will be responsible for managing and growing the company’s online presence across all social media platforms. The ideal candidate is creative, data-driven, and passionate about digital storytelling. Key Responsibilities Develop and execute social media strategies to increase brand awareness, engagement, and lead generation. Manage content creation (graphics, captions, videos, reels, stories, etc.) and publishing schedules. Monitor, track, and report performance metrics to optimize campaigns. Engage with the online community, respond to inquiries, and build brand loyalty. Collaborate with the marketing and sales team to align campaigns with business goals. Stay updated with social media trends, tools, and best practices. Requirements 1 – 2 years of proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role. Strong knowledge of Instagram, Facebook, Twitter (X), LinkedIn, TikTok, and YouTube. Basic design skills (Canva/Photoshop) and knowledge of video editing is an advantage. Excellent communication and copywriting skills. Ability to analyze insights and adapt strategies accordingly. Creative, proactive, and able to work with minimal supervision. Benefits Competitive salary (?120,000 – ?150,000). Growth opportunities within the company. A dynamic and collaborative work environment. Method of Application Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@bakersindustries.io using “Application – Social Media Manager” as the subject of the mail. We continually pursue innovative and dynamic means of attaining this through our unrivalled product portfolio, our highly differentiated integrative healthcare solutions and our industry-best pharmacy services. We are recruiting to fill the position below: Job Position: Female Sales Executive Job Locations: Yaba and Surulere, Lagos Employment Type: Full-time Working schedule: 8AM - 10PM, one day on, one day off Requirements Female Sales Executives are needed in an FMCG operating in Lagos (Surulere and Yaba). They have to be smart, customer service oriented and friendly. Having prior experience in an FMCG is an added advantage. Salary N70,000 / month (depending on experience). Our customers are our top priority, which is why we go above and beyond to satisfy every customer, every day. We continually pursue innovative and dynamic means of attaining this through our unrivalled product portfolio, our highly differentiated integrative healthcare solutions and our industry-best pharmacy services. We are recruiting to fill the position below: Job Position: Female Sales Executive Job Locations: Yaba and Surulere, Lagos Employment Type: Full-time Working schedule: 8AM - 10PM, one day on, one day off Requirements Female Sales Executives are needed in an FMCG operating in Lagos (Surulere and Yaba). They have to be smart, customer service oriented and friendly. Having prior experience in an FMCG is an added advantage. Salary N70,000 / month (depending on experience). Method of Application Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@healthritepharm.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
